metadata.name: 700000Items
metadata.description:
Do you like The Binding of Isaac? Are you bored of the currently existing items and wish there were more of them? Like, a lot more? Maybe even 700,000 more?
Well, then this mod is for you!
Featuring at least 1000 randomly generated bootleg items with random stats, effects, names, and sprites!
*there is not actually 700,000 items. Not that it would be impossible, but it makes the game horribly slow to start and would take a lot of time to actually generate this many items.
Find me on Github: https://github.com/jellonator/700000items
